histogram.name: PA.PCScan.{Process}.{Actor}
histogram.summary: Overall duration of a single PCScan cycle in the {Process} process. Performed by {Actor} thread(s). Reported once per PCScan cycle at the end.

histogram.name: PA.PCScan.{Process}.{Actor}.{Phase}
histogram.summary: Duration of the PCScan phase that {Phase} in the {Process} process. Performed by {Actor} thread(s). Reported once per each PCScan cycle at the end.

variant.name: Clear
variant.summary: clears quarantined entries and prepares internal structures for faster lookup

variant.name: Scan
variant.summary: scans the partition alloc heap looking for dangling pointers

variant.name: ScanStack
variant.summary: scans the stack for dangling pointers

variant.name: Sweep
variant.summary: performs sweeping (actual freeing) of memory that is no longer reachable
